trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFLIMITEDDISTRIBUTION_00917_PILGRIMMOOGLE_000_000<tab>Wh-What's this? You're able to see me!? That's amazing, kupo!

TEXT_CMNDEFLIMITEDDISTRIBUTION_00917_PILGRIMMOOGLE_000_001<tab>That we should thus meet can surely be no coincidence. And so, to mark this fateful occasion, I shall make you a gift of a magical potion. “Fantasia,” it's called, and legend holds that it allows you to alter your appearance. May it serve you well, kupo!

TEXT_CMNDEFLIMITEDDISTRIBUTION_00917_PILGRIMMOOGLE_000_002<tab>Well now, that we should meet yet again, and just as I was given another phial of Fantasia from my minstrel friend! It's clearly fate's design that you should have it, so do take it with you, kupo!
TEXT_CMNDEFLIMITEDDISTRIBUTION_00917_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Inventory is full. Make room in your inventory and speak with the wandering moogle once again to claim your reward.

TEXT_CMNDEFLIMITEDDISTRIBUTION_00917_PILGRIMMOOGLE_000_010<tab>Have you already used the Fantasia? The flavor is meant to be a little...challenging, but it's a small price to pay to become a brand-new you! Bottoms up, kupo!
